name: Pumpkin Soup
description:
XBox controllers are required!

Pumpkin Soup was created for AllyJam, a one week gamejam by GameJolt focusing on being an ally to targets of hate. 

Inspired by Overcooked, we wanted to create an experience where three players must work together to farm ingredients, chop veggies, and cook a variety of pumpkin soup to serve as many customers as possible in a day. Each day the team of players receives a score that reflects how well they worked together.
